pages.text: The Blue Ice Strain$(br2)Base THC: 20% $(br)Base CBD: 5% $(br)Effect: Night Vision
Blue Ice Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Blue Ice Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Blue Ice Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Blue Ice Weed in an Extractor
You can package your blue ice weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
